name: ThoughtCatcher
signal_source: Note-taking users report 'mental clutter is a big-time creativity killer' and need apps that 'transform scattered thoughts into actionable plans'
description: Brain dump app that captures random thoughts instantly and uses simple AI to suggest connections and next actions
target_user: Creative professionals and knowledge workers overwhelmed by scattered ideas who struggle with traditional note organization
pain_point_evidence: Users describe need to 'dump anything and rest assured you'll find it easily later' with 'beautifully organized notes' from brain dumps
differentiation: Capture-first vs. organize-first, focuses on thought flow rather than rigid structure
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited storage, advanced AI connections, and multi-device sync

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic capture, premium for AI features and unlimited storage
